text: WWF Capital Carnage was a United Kingdom exclusive professional wrestling pay- per-view event made by the World Wrestling Federation (WWF). It took place on December 6, 1998 at the London Arena in London, England. ==Results== No. Results Stipulations Times 1 Droz defeated Mosh. Singles match 06:00 2 Gangrel defeated Al Snow.(with Head) Singles match 05:51 3 The Headbangers (Mosh and Thrasher) defeated The Legion of Doom (Droz and Animal). Tag team match 03:21 4 Val Venis defeated Goldust. Singles match 05:33 5 Tiger Ali Singh defeated Edge. Singles match 02:51 6 Sable and Christian defeated Jacqueline and Marc Mero. Mixed tag team match 04:49 7 Ken Shamrock (c) defeated Steve Blackman. Singles match for the WWF Intercontinental Championship 06:51 8 Triple H (with Chyna) defeated Jeff Jarrett (with Debra). Singles match 06:55 9 The New Age Outlaws (Road Dogg and Billy Gunn) (c) defeated D'Lo Brown and Mark Henry. Tag team match for the WWF Tag Team Championship 12:34 10 The Rock (c) defeated X-Pac by disqualification. Singles match for the WWF Championship 12:34 11 Steve Austin defeated Kane, Mankind and The Undertaker. Fatal Four-Way match with Gerald Brisco as special guest referee 16:12 ==Related pages== *List of WWE pay-per-view events ==References== Category:World Wrestling Entertainment pay-per-view events
title: WWF Capital Carnage
